name: Miyamoto Musashi quote
description: "There is nothing outside of yourself that can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker, or smarter. Everything is within. Everything exists. Seek nothing outside of yourself."

name: The 80/20 Rule
description: 80% of your results will come from just 20% of your tasks, and the small results will come from the other 80% of "small" tasks. You can also do the 20% of tasks and outsource the other 80%. Chances are your competition is trying to do a mix of both so you can absolutely obliterate them.

name: Foresee your potential failures
description: Visualizing failure/obstacles will help us dramatically because it lets us prepare for the potential obstacles that could come our way when on the path to achieving our goals. (Visualize someone coming into your room when you're trying to focus and how you would deal with it. Visualize getting sucked into YouTube and wasting 3 hours watching pointless videos. Now mentally rehearse how you would overcome that).

name: Fast from food
description: The single most significant process our body goes through is digesting food. Why would we want to ruin our focus by eating before we work? Don't eat anything until your most important tasks are complete.

name: Make sure to get at least 7 hours of "real" sleep a night
description: The single most significant process our body goes through is digesting food. Why would we want to ruin our focus by eating before we work? Don't eat anything until your most important tasks are complete.
